title: Integrating Medical Scientific Knowledge with the Semantically Quantified Self

author: Allan Third, Knowledge Media Institute (KMI), Open University (OU)

segmentation: Hi, thank you for the introduction.
So yes I'm Alan.

Project on helping patients at risk of cardiac and renal comorbidities.

When we got into, these are the same thing.
